prompt: Which creature is a regular subject in habitat conservation talks?
icl_complete: One creature that is frequently a focal point in habitat conservation discussions is the tiger. Tigers are iconic and critically endangered animals whose survival is heavily dependent on effective conservation efforts. These efforts often involve protecting large tracts of forest and grassland habitats, combating poaching, and reducing human-wildlife conflict. Conserving tigers also has the added benefit of preserving the broader ecosystem in which they live, as they are apex predators and play a crucial role in maintaining the balance of their habitats.
